import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './UserProfile.css' import axios from 'axios' import { getLocal } from '../helpers/auth' import jwt_decode from "jwt-decode" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import profile from '../images/profile.png' function UserProfile() { const { user_id } = jwt_decode(getLocal()) const [profile_img, setImage] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() const history = useNavigate() const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: '', email: "", profile_img: "" }) useEffect(() => { async function getUser() { const user = await axios.get(`http://localhost:2000/api/user-details/${user_id}/`) setUser(user.data) } getUser(); }, []) const updateProfile = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:2000/api/user-update/${user_id}/`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ profile_img, }) }) console.log('images', profile_img, 'user', user.username); } return (
{user.username}
